search.query:
index=your_index sourcetype=your_sourcetype status=*
| eval status_category = if(status >= 400 AND status < 500, "4xx", "Other")
| stats count by status_category
| eval ratio = if('4xx' > 0, ('4xx' / ('4xx' + Other)) * 100, 0)
| where ratio >= (10 / 20) * 100
| eval timestamp = strftime(_time, "%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
| table timestamp, ratio
